name: part_005
file: tmp_【#holoIDChromaticFuture 】Free Partial - hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future [ScI02LHlT-w]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Kobo, Kaela, and Zeta talking to the audience.
Performance of the song 'Sip Some Tea' by hololive Indonesia members.

subtitles.original: Jadi kita sambil keliling-liling kan nyapa fans gitu ya.
subtitles.english: So we walked around while greeting the fans, right?

subtitles.original: Asik banget ya tadi ya?
subtitles.english: It was really fun earlier, right?

subtitles.original: Aku juga suka banget tadi ada sebagian reff-nya ya.
subtitles.english: I also really liked that there was part of the refrain earlier.

subtitles.original: Da la da la da la da la...
subtitles.english: Da la da la da la da la...

subtitles.original: Itu... Itu beda lagu gak sih?
subtitles.english: That... isn't that a different song?

subtitles.original: Ih gak gitu deh. Gak gitu kek.
subtitles.english: Eh, not like that. Not like that, man.

subtitles.original: Ya tapi pokoknya asik lah ya kalau nyanyi lagu chill santai-santai kayak gini.
subtitles.english: Yeah but anyway it's fun to sing a chill song, relaxing like this.

subtitles.original: Iya santai dong.
subtitles.english: Yeah, relax of course.

subtitles.original: Tapi... ngomongin soal santai, kita tuh sebenernya belum bisa santai dulu. Heh, santai!
subtitles.english: But... speaking of relaxing, we actually can't relax yet. Hey, relax!

subtitles.original: Hehe, karena... kayaknya katanya gak boleh santai terus.
subtitles.english: Hehe, because... it seems they said we can't keep relaxing.

subtitles.original: Iya iya iya jangan santai-santai. Jangan terlalu santai.
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah yeah don't relax. Don't be too relaxed.

subtitles.original: Karena konsernya tuh masih panjang.
subtitles.english: Because the concert is still long.

subtitles.original: Jadi, sebelum itu, kalian ada gak yang mau kalian sampein dulu? Mulai dari ini nih yang gak bisa diem.
subtitles.english: So, before that, is there anything you want to convey first? Starting from this one who can't stay still.

subtitles.original: Tiga kata saja.
subtitles.english: Just three words.

subtitles.original: I love you.
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: Keren.
subtitles.english: Cool.

subtitles.original: The best.
subtitles.english: The best.

subtitles.original: Sangat jelas ya.
subtitles.english: Very clear, yes.

subtitles.original: Tetap semangat. Tetap semangat menjalani hidup ya.
subtitles.english: Stay spirited. Stay spirited in living life, okay.

subtitles.original: Udah gitu aja. Pokoknya sampai akhir masih panjang. Semangat!
subtitles.english: That's all. Anyway until the end it's still long. Spirit!

subtitles.original: Sarangheyo~
subtitles.english: I love you~

subtitles.original: Gak mau yooo.
subtitles.english: I don't want to yooo.

subtitles.original: Oke kalau aku... Yah... Semangat selalu.
subtitles.english: Okay if it's me... Well... Spirit always.

subtitles.original: Semangat santai.
subtitles.english: Relaxed spirit.

subtitles.original: Hidup jangan terlalu dibawa serius.
subtitles.english: Don't take life too seriously.

subtitles.original: Semangat santai ya?
subtitles.english: Relaxed spirit huh?

subtitles.original: Semangat santai.
subtitles.english: Relaxed spirit.

subtitles.original: Semangat santai.
subtitles.english: Relaxed spirit.

subtitles.original: Oke kalau gitu kita lanjut gak? Kita...
subtitles.english: Okay in that case shall we continue? We...

subtitles.original: Weits weits weits tunggu dulu.
subtitles.english: Wait wait wait hold on.

subtitles.original: Sebelum selesai... selesai ini nih ya... kita teriak bareng-bareng penonton dulu gak sih?
subtitles.english: Before finishing... finishing this part... shouldn't we shout together with the audience first?

subtitles.original: Iya dong. Ayo ayo ayo!
subtitles.english: Yes of course. Come on come on!

subtitles.original: Oke oke. Jadi... kita teriak bareng ya. Dalam hitungan tiga.
subtitles.english: Okay okay. So... let's shout together. In the count of three.

subtitles.original: Kita sama-sama teriak Chromatic Future. Oke ya?
subtitles.english: We shout Chromatic Future together. Okay?

subtitles.original: Oke oke. Chromatic Future. Gitu kan ya?
subtitles.english: Okay okay. Chromatic Future. Like that right?

subtitles.original: Iya iya kayak gitu. Oke langsung ya. Sambil lihat sini sini sini. Sambil lihat.
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah like that. Okay straight away. While looking here here here. While looking.

subtitles.original: Aku ya aku... aku yang penonton ini nih.
subtitles.english: Me, yes me... I'm the audience here.

subtitles.original: Iya iya. Aku... aku ini deh, yang tengah yang tengah. Halo!
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah. I... I'll be this one, the one in the middle. Hello!

subtitles.original: Oke bareng-bareng ya. Satu, dua, tiga!
subtitles.english: Okay together. One, two, three!

subtitles.original: Chromatic Future!
subtitles.english: Chromatic Future!

subtitles.original: Everything was easy, I did it all alone.
subtitles.english: Everything was easy, I did it all alone.

subtitles.original: So effortlessly, I spread my wings and let my magic unfold.
subtitles.english: So effortlessly, I spread my wings and let my magic unfold.

subtitles.original: Got all problems solved without any setbacks there is nothing uncontrolled.
subtitles.english: Got all problems solved without any setbacks there is nothing uncontrolled.

subtitles.original: But there's no way I can begin, dream life that I need to win.
subtitles.english: But there's no way I can begin, dream life that I need to win.

subtitles.original: I need to feel how all these things crumble into little pieces.
subtitles.english: I need to feel how all these things crumble into little pieces.

subtitles.original: I know I gotta soar a little higher.
subtitles.english: I know I gotta soar a little higher.

subtitles.original: Hope all turns to be the things I desire.
subtitles.english: Hope all turns to be the things I desire.

subtitles.original: Layaknya burung merak yang bersayap.
subtitles.english: Like a winged peacock.

subtitles.original: Kan ku taklukan gelap.
subtitles.english: I will conquer the darkness.

subtitles.original: Dengan sihir angin kan ku ajak.
subtitles.english: With wind magic I will invite.

subtitles.original: Semua yang terlelap tuk bangkit melawan dunia.
subtitles.english: Everyone asleep to rise and fight the world.

subtitles.original: We'll never give up.
subtitles.english: We'll never give up.

subtitles.original: As long as we got the strength in ourselves.
subtitles.english: As long as we got the strength in ourselves.

subtitles.original: We could rise above the pain.
subtitles.english: We could rise above the pain.

subtitles.original: Walking step by step, trusting my own pace.
subtitles.english: Walking step by step, trusting my own pace.

subtitles.original: Giving me what I deserve to have.
subtitles.english: Giving me what I deserve to have.

subtitles.original: Let it go! (Just believe me!)
subtitles.english: Let it go! (Just believe me!)

subtitles.original: They'll never bring me down, just believe me.
subtitles.english: They'll never bring me down, just believe me.

subtitles.original: Let it go! (Just believe me!)
subtitles.english: Let it go! (Just believe me!)

subtitles.original: It'll never bring us down, just believe me.
subtitles.english: It'll never bring us down, just believe me.

subtitles.original: Let it go! Won't let their cruelty stealin' my royalty.
subtitles.english: Let it go! Won't let their cruelty stealin' my royalty.

subtitles.original: And when the universe works against me I will just... Let it go!
subtitles.english: And when the universe works against me I will just... Let it go!

subtitles.original: If it's spicy, just sip some tea, let it go.
subtitles.english: If it's spicy, just sip some tea, let it go.

subtitles.original: If it's spicy, just sip some tea, let it go.
subtitles.english: If it's spicy, just sip some tea, let it go.

subtitles.english: If it's spicy, just sip some tea, let it go.

subtitles.original: Let it go!
subtitles.english: Let it go!

subtitles.original: I've been living carefree.
subtitles.english: I've been living carefree.

subtitles.original: There's no bitter words in the world that could affect me.
subtitles.english: There's no bitter words in the world that could affect me.

subtitles.original: I spread my wings and let my magic unfold.
subtitles.english: I spread my wings and let my magic unfold.

subtitles.original: Not letting it show.
subtitles.english: Not letting it show.

subtitles.original: Stings but I'm bigger than my feelings so that will be enough.
subtitles.english: Stings but I'm bigger than my feelings so that will be enough.

subtitles.original: There is no way I can begin, dream life that I need to win.
subtitles.english: There is no way I can begin, dream life that I need to win.

subtitles.original: I need to feel how all these things crumble into little pieces.
subtitles.english: I need to feel how all these things crumble into little pieces.

subtitles.original: I know I gotta be better than ever.
subtitles.english: I know I gotta be better than ever.

subtitles.original: Hope all turns to be sweeter than ever.
subtitles.english: Hope all turns to be sweeter than ever.
